title: Death (Halloween)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Death is a non-player character who appears at a player's death during Halloween events. When he appears, he proclaims a random phrase (a list of which can be seen below). According to Mod Ash, Death is an aspect of the Grim Reaper, and is merely a visual representation of the "inconceivable reality"[1].

content:
Not to be confused with Grim Reaper.
Death
Released24 October 2013 (Update)
MembersNo
RaceN/A
LocationAnywhere a player died (only during Halloween events)
GenderMale
ExamineDo not fear the Reaper.
Advanced data
NPC ID5567

Death is a non-player character who appears at a player's death during Halloween events. When he appears, he proclaims a random phrase (a list of which can be seen below). According to Mod Ash, Death is an aspect of the Grim Reaper, and is merely a visual representation of the "inconceivable reality"[1].

He is removed at the end of each holiday event.

Other phrases said by Death[edit | edit source]

  • Let me escort you to (respawn point), (player name)...
  • (player name) is mine!
  • Now is the time you die, (player name).
  • Muahahahahaha!
  • There is no escape, (player name)...
  • Beware Mortals. (player name) travels with me now.
  • I claim (player name) as my own.
  • Your time here is over, (player name).
  • I have come for you, (player name)!
Death claiming a player as they die.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • His examine text, "Do not fear the Reaper", is a reference to the Blue Öyster Cult's song, "(Don't Fear) The Reaper".
  • A possibility is that Death is a lesser reaper, or that "Death" is a generic term for all lesser reapers (explaining why multiple Deaths can appear at once).

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ^ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 4 November 2015. (Archived from the original on 28 January 2019.) Mod Ash: "Death is Death; the figure with the bones and the scythe is merely a visual representation of the inconceivable reality."

'''Death''' is a [[non-player character]] who appears at a player's death during Halloween events. When he appears, he proclaims a random phrase (a list of which can be seen below). According to Mod Ash, Death is an aspect of the [[Grim Reaper]], and is merely a visual representation of the "inconceivable reality"{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/661964610262708224|date=4 November 2015|archiveurl=https://archive.is/eqkv5|archivedate=28 January 2019|quote=''Death is Death; the figure with the bones and the scythe is merely a visual representation of the inconceivable reality.''}}.

He is removed at the end of each holiday event.

===Other phrases said by Death===
*Let me escort you to (''respawn point''), (''player name'')...
*(''player name'') is mine!
*Now is the time you die, (''player name'').
*Muahahahahaha!
*There is no escape, (''player name'')...
*Beware Mortals. (''player name'') travels with me now.
*I claim (''player name'') as my own.
*Your time here is over, (''player name'').
*I have come for you, (''player name'')!

==Trivia==
*His examine text, "Do not fear the Reaper", is a reference to the Blue Öyster Cult's song, "(Don't Fear) The Reaper".
*A possibility is that Death is a lesser reaper, or that "Death" is a generic term for all lesser reapers (explaining why multiple Deaths can appear at once).
